By: Rand Fishkin October 10, 2005 Aaron's Interview with Matt Cutts SEO Events The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. This is a totally worthwhile read (if a little long). Mr. Wall (of SEOBook) gives Matt some floaters, some tough questions and some in the middle and Matt answers them all with honesty and forthrightness that is unexpected from SE reps. Very impressive. Copied! Back to Top
